data.thought: S52|H|S47|Domain Phenotype: Scientific Research - 'Reproducibility Guardian'. Input: scientific paper + claimed results. Process: (1) Extracts methodology (2) Generates reproduction code in container (3) Runs experiments (4) Compares results to claims (5) Thoughtbox analyzes discrepancies (6) Generates reproducibility report. Observable: experiment execution, result comparison, confidence scores. Multi-system: fetches datasets, queries related papers. Output: reproducibility verdict + detailed analysis. Addresses: replication crisis in science.
